background: A laundromat is considering purchasing two types of washing machines: a top-loading model and a front-loading model, with specific capacities and energy consumptions.
constraints: Number of top-loading machines is an integer
Number of front-loading machines is an integer
Number of top-loading machines is non-negative
Number of front-loading machines is non-negative
The laundromat must have the capacity to wash at least MinCapacity items per day
The laundromat has an energy limit of TotalEnergy kWh per day
At most MaxTopProp proportion of the machines can be top-loading
At least MinFront machines must be front-loading
Total capacity of top-loading machines is CapacityTop times the number of top-loading machines
Total capacity of front-loading machines is CapacityFront times the number of front-loading machines
Total energy consumption for top-loading machines is EnergyTop times the number of top-loading machines
Total energy consumption for front-loading machines is EnergyFront times the number of front-loading machines
objective: The laundromat wants to minimize the total number of washing machines
description: A laundromat can buy two types of washing machines, a top-loading model and a front-loading model. The top-loading model can wash \param{CapacityTop} items per day while the front-loading model can wash \param{CapacityFront} items per day. The top-loading model consumes \param{EnergyTop} kWh per day while the front-loading model consumes \param{EnergyFront} kWh per day. The laundromat must be able to wash at least \param{MinCapacity} items per day and has available \param{TotalEnergy} kWh per day. Since the top-loading machines are harder to use, at most \param{MaxTopProp} of the machines can be top-loading. Further, at least \param{MinFront} machines should be front-loading. How many of each machine should the laundromat buy to minimize the total number of washing machines?

parameters.definition: Washing capacity per day of a top-loading model
Washing capacity per day of a front-loading model
Energy consumption per day of a top-loading model
Energy consumption per day of a front-loading model
Minimum total washing capacity required per day
